intro: Lepisorus yunnanensis, commonly known as the Yunnan shield fern, is a species of fern belonging to the family Polypodiaceae. It is characterized by its shield-shaped fronds, which are typically dark green and have a leathery texture. This plant is native to the mountainous regions of Yunnan Province in China, where it thrives in moist, shaded environments. Lepisorus yunnanensis is often found growing on rocks or tree trunks, showcasing its adaptability to rocky and epiphytic habitats. Its unique morphology and ecological niche make it an interesting subject for botanical study.
